thread.title: Ivo Karlovic aces first-round test with win over Andreas Seppi in Vienna
thread.title_full: Ivo Karlovic aces first-round test with win over Andreas Seppi in Vienna

title: Ivo Karlovic aces first-round test with win over Andreas Seppi in Vienna
text:
Ivo Karlovic aces first-round test with win over Andreas Seppi in Vienna 19 Oct 2015 20:17:20 
comments 
Ivo Karlovic slammed down 17 aces on his way to a straight sets victory over Italy's Andreas Seppi in the Erste Open in Vienna on Monday. 
The Croatian took the first set on a tight tie-break and crucially grabbed the only break of the match midway through the second set to triumph 7-6 (7/5) 6-3. 
Karlovic was joined in the second round by Latvian Ernests Gulbis who survived a scare against home player Lucas Miedler before progressing 6-3 2-6 6-3. 
Veteran Radek Stepanek was a 6-4 6-3 winner over local wild card Dennis Novak while there were also wins for Lukas Rosol and Jiri Vesely, who beat Yuichi Sugita and Gerald Melzer respectively. Related Sport News
